# Substack

```{r substack-feed, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyRSS)
library(dplyr)

feed <- tidyfeed("https://pmheideman.substack.com/feed")

feed %>%
  slice_head(n = 5) %>%
  mutate(link = paste0("[", item_title, "](", item_link, ")")) %>%
  pull(link) %>%
  paste0("- ", ., collapse = "\n") %>%
  cat()
